gene.function: FUNCTION: Forms part of a macromolecular complex that catalyzes the attachment of specific amino acids to cognate tRNAs during protein synthesis (PubMed:25288775). Modulates the secretion of AIMP1 and may be involved in generation of the inflammatory cytokine EMAP2 from AIMP1 (PubMed:17443684). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17443684, ECO:0000269|PubMed:25288775}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:10791971, ECO:0000269|PubMed:16055448, ECO:0000269|PubMed:16430231}. Cytoplasm, cytosol {ECO:0000269|PubMed:19289464}.
